info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:59PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lea County through 630 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles west of Jal, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Lea County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
